title: Malted Chocolate Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Malted Chocolate Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
chocolate ice cream
6
tablespoons
milk
4
tablespoons
malted milk powder
Directions
Blend all ingredients together until well blended and smooth, about 30 seconds. Serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Blender
Notes
For the creamiest results, use a good quality ice cream such as Haagen-Dazs. I used Horlicks malted milk powder for this milkshake, but Carnation brand should work just as well. To help keep the milkshake from melting too fast, chill the blender pitcher first.
